com.nestedbird.config

Class TemplateConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nestedbird.config.TemplateConfig

  • public class TemplateConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for configuring the template engine This includes reading properties from the properties files and creating required beans
